snippet.title: Create Your Own Adventure Game in Adventure Maker!
snippet.description:
Download and support Adventure Maker here: https://www.patreon.com/DreamMix
Discord: https://discord.gg/B29C2Wa

If you're a streamer, video maker, reviewer, or any kind of content creator (big or small), send information about how you want to present the game to DreamMixYT@gmail.com , or leave a comment on this video saying so, and you can get a review build.

We'll start a map making contest this month. There will be at least 5 top maps chosen, or more if there are too many great maps! I will be judging this contest. Map creators will get a spotlight in a video about the contest. This will repeat itself every month to allow map creators to advertise there works, and possibly sell them later.

If you want the most recent build of this game through paypal instead, because you can't do patreon, shoot me an email at dreammixyt@gmail.com and we can work that out. :)

Maps in this video were made by Geerterig and KOOLKID67890 from our Discord. Come to the Dream Mix Discord and be a part of the community, and download their maps, and other maps and mods!

Thanks for watching this video. Could you do us a favor and let it play through all the way, even on mute, just so we can get it out there? Also, could you like this video if you think these maps look good, or if you want to help get this project out there. I personally really appreciate your support as a viewer, and I will return to you an awesome game for your help! :)
